Title: How to use GitHub Copilot for code reviews in pull requests
Description:
Struggling with messy code or want a second pair of eyes before requesting a team review? Learn how to use GitHub Copilot as your first code reviewer, directly within a pull request. We'll show you how to request a review, accept single or batched suggestions with one click, and improve your code quality before it ever gets to your team.
